Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.events.messages.server

package it.polimi.ingsw.events.messages.server
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.events.messages
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.events.messages.client
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CommonGoalsUpdateMessage
    Message that the Server sends to a Client to provide the public goals
    ConnectionConfirmationMessage
    Message that the Server sends to a Client to confirm that it was correctly connected to the server.
    DeckUpdateMessage
    Message that the Server sends to a Client to inform it that one of the deck has changed.
    GameListMessage
    Message that the server sends to a client to provide the available games list
    GameStatusUpdateMessage
    Message that the server sends to the clients to update the current game status (turn status and current turn)
    JoinConfirmationMessage
    JoinConfirmationMessage allows the server to confirm that a client joined a certain game.
    PlayersBoardUpdateMessage
    Message that the Server sends to a Client to inform it that one of the boards has changed.
    PlayersHandUpdateMessage
    Message that the Server sends to a Client to inform it that one of the players received a new card.
    PlayersListUpdateMessage
    Message that the server sends to the clients when a players join, leave or change color (lobby only).
    PrivateGoalUpdateMessage
    Message that the Server sends to a Client to inform it that its private goals were updated.
    ScoreUpdateMessage
    Message that the server sends to the clients when the scoreboard is updated
    ServerChatMsgMessage
    Message that the server sends to the client in order to forward a chat message.
    ServerErrorMessage
    Message that the server sends to a client when an error occurs while processing one of the client's messages in order to report such error.
    ServerMessage
    Abstract message that the Server sends to the Client.
    ServerToClientPingMessage
    Allows the server to send a ping message to a client.
    StartCardUpdateMessage
    Message that the Server sends to a Client to provide the Starting card.
    VisibleCardUpdateMessage
    Message that the Server sends to a Client to inform it that one of the visible cards has changed.
